message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_FV_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Rule Set Start Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XRV_ASSOCIATION_IS_NOT_ACTIVE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Rule Set association is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XRV_ASSOCIATION_IS_NOT_ACTIVE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: Rule Set association is '%1c', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XFV_START_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE
message.locale: The Rule Set Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XRV_RULE_SET_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Rule Set '%1c' is already exists for '%2c' from %3d to %4d.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XFV_RULESET_ENTERED_DATASTORE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Data Store must be entered if Rule Set has been entered.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XFV_DATASTORE_ENTERED_RULESET_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Rule Set must be entered if Data Store has been entered.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XFV_RULESET_START_DATE_ENTERED_RULESET_DATASTORE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Rule Set and Data Store must be entered if Rule Set Start Date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XFV_RULESET_END_DATE_ENTERED_RULESET_DATASTORE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Rule Set, Data Store and Rule Set Start Date must be entered if Rule Set End Date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XRV_RULESET_START_DATE_LATER_THAN_SERVICE_OFFERING_START_DATE
message.locale: Rule Set Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the Start Date of the service, %2d.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XRV_RULESET_END_DATE_LATER_THAN_SERVICE_OFFERING_END_DATE
message.locale: Rule Set End Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date of the service, %2d.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XFV_RULESET_START_DATE_ENTERED_RULESET_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Rule Set must be entered if Rule Set Start Date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_CREOLERULESETLINK_XFV_RULESET_END_DATE_ENTERED_RULESET_STARTDATE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Rule Set and Rule Set Start Date must be entered if Rule Set End Date has been entered.
